title: Lifting the Mask (with Andy McDonald MP)
itunes:title: Lifting the Mask (with Andy McDonald MP)
description:
The Government's climate policies are not consistent with its targets, says Andy McDonald, Labour MP for Middlesbrough. On covid, he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker the lifting of mask restrictions has been 'foolish.'

Plus: Sam Fazeli of Bloomberg Intelligence has the latest on the U.K.'s virus rates, the booster program and whether we should worry about the delta plus variant.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
